code.title: Code
code.description: Code to be used in documents

name.title: Name
name.description: Short name of the category to be used instead of code in output

title.title: Title
title.description: Human name for the code to use for titles

retained.title: Retained
retained.description:
Retained when true implies that the tax amount will be retained
by the buyer on behalf of the supplier, and thus subtracted from
the invoice taxable base total. Typically used for taxes related to
income.

rates.title: Rates
rates.description: Specific tax definitions inside this category.

extensions.title: Extensions
extensions.description:
Extensions defines a list of extension keys that may be used or required
as an alternative or alongside choosing a rate for the tax category.
Every key must be defined in the Regime's extensions table.

map.title: Map
map.description: Map defines a set of regime specific code mappings.

sources.title: Sources
sources.description: List of sources for the information contained in this category.

ext.title: Extensions
ext.description:
Extensions key-value pairs that will be copied to the tax combo if this
category is used.

meta.title: Meta
meta.description:
Meta contains additional information about the category that is relevant
for local frequently used formats.

CategoryDef.description: CategoryDef contains the definition of a general type of tax inside a region.

schema.title: Schema
schema.description: Partial or complete schema URL for the document type supported by correction.

types.title: Types
types.description: The types of sub-documents supported by the regime

extensions.title: Extensions
extensions.description: Extension keys that can be included

reason_required.title: Reason Required
reason_required.description: ReasonRequired when true implies that a reason must be provided

stamps.title: Stamps
stamps.description: Stamps that must be copied from the preceding document.

CorrectionDefinition.description: CorrectionDefinition contains details about what can be defined in .

CorrectionSet.description: CorrectionSet defines a set of correction definitions for a selection of schemas.

key.title: Key
key.description: Key identifies this rate within the system

exempt.title: Exempt
exempt.description:
Exempt when true implies that the rate when used in a tax Combo should
not define a percent value.

values.title: Values
values.description:
Values contains a list of Value objects that contain the
current and historical percentage values for the rate and
additional filters.
Order is important, newer values should come before
older values.

ext.title: Extensions
ext.description:
Extensions key-value pair that will be copied to the tax combo if this
rate is used.

meta.title: Meta
meta.description:
Meta contains additional information about the rate that is relevant
for local frequently used implementations.

RateDef.description: RateDef defines a single rate inside a category

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Only apply this rate if one of the tags is present in the invoice.

ext.title: Extensions
ext.description: Ext map of keys that can be used to filter to determine if the rate applies.

since.title: Since
since.description: Date from which this value should be applied.

percent.title: Percent
percent.description: Percent rate that should be applied

disabled.title: Disabled
disabled.description: When true, this value should no longer be used.

RateValueDef.description: RateValueDef contains a percentage rate or fixed amount for a given date range.

time_zone.title: Time Zone
time_zone.description:
Location name for the country's central time zone. Accepted
values from IANA Time Zone Database (https://iana.org/time-zones).

alt_country_codes.title: Alternative Country Codes
alt_country_codes.description:
Alternative localization codes that may be used to identify the tax regime
in specific circumstances.

zone.title: Zone
zone.description:
Specific Locality, region, city, province, county, or similar code inside
the country, if needed.

calculator_rounding_rule.title: Calculator Rounding Rule
calculator_rounding_rule.description:
Rounding rule to use when calculating the tax totals, default is always
`sum-then-round`.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description:
Tags that can be applied at the document level to identify additional
considerations.

extensions.title: Extensions
extensions.description:
Extensions defines the keys that can be used for extended or extra data inside the regime that
is specific to the regime and cannot be easily determined from other GOBL structures.
Typically these are used to define local codes for suppliers, customers, products, or tax rates.

identity_keys.title: Identity Keys
identity_keys.description:
Identity keys used in addition to regular tax identities and specific for the
regime that may be validated against.

identity_types.description:
Identity Types are used as an alternative to Identity Keys when there is a clear local
definition of a specific code.

charge_keys.title: Charge Keys
charge_keys.description: Charge keys specific for the regime and may be validated or used in the UI as suggestions

payment_means_keys.title: Payment Means Keys
payment_means_keys.description:
PaymentMeansKeys specific for the regime that extend the original
base payment means keys.

inbox_keys.title: Inbox Keys
inbox_keys.description:
InboxKeys specific to the regime that can be used to identify where a document
should be forwarded to.

corrections.title: Corrections
corrections.description: Configuration details for corrections to be used with correction options.

RegimeDef.description: RegimeDef defines the holding structure for the definitions of taxes inside a country or territory.

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the scenario for further information.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Array of tags that have been applied to the document.

ext_key.title: Extension Key
ext_key.description: Extension key that must be present in the document.

ext_value.title: Extension Value
ext_value.description:
Extension value that along side the key must be present for a match
to happen. This cannot be used without an `ExtKey`. The value will
be copied to the note code if needed.

note.title: Note
note.description: A note to be added to the document if the scenario is applied.

codes.title: Codes
codes.description:
Codes is used to define additional codes for regime specific
situations.

ext.title: Extensions
ext.description:
Ext represents a set of tax extensions that should be applied to
the document in the appropriate "tax" context.

Scenario.description: Scenario is used to describe a tax scenario of a document based on the combination of document type and tag used.

schema.title: Schema
schema.description: Partial or complete schema URL for the document type

list.title: List
list.description: List of scenarios for the schema

ScenarioSet.description: ScenarioSet is a collection of tax scenarios for a given schema that can be used to determine special codes or notes that need to be included in the final document.

title.title: Title
title.description: Title of the linked source to help distinguish between this and other links.

Source.description: Source describes where the information for the taxes comes from.

schema.title: Schema
schema.description: Schema that the tags are associated with.

list.title: List
list.description: List of tags for the schema

TagSet.description: TagSet defines a set of tags and their descriptions that can be used for a specific schema in the context of a Regime or Addon.
